plot outline: Employed in Kurla in a Multinational Call Center where he is instructed to speak with an accent, Nilesh Rastogi misses the last 1:40 AM Kalyan-bound local-train to return home to Vikhroli. Asked to leave the platform by a Hawaldar, he goes looking for an alternate place to hang out until the next train at 4:10 AM. He meets with a stranded woman, Madhu, and both find out that auto-rickshaws are on a flash strike due to a bomb blast at Ghatkopar. Their attempts to find alternate transportation are in vain, the duo then attend a bar and this is where both their lives will be turned upside down.
title: Ek Chalis Ki Last Local
plot: A comic thriller about two people who miss the last local train at 1:40 am and how missing of their train changes their course of life forever.

Employed in Kurla in a Multinational Call Center where he is instructed to speak with an accent, Nilesh Rastogi misses the last 1:40 AM Kalyan-bound local-train to return home to Vikhroli. Asked to leave the platform by a Hawaldar, he goes looking for an alternate place to hang out until the next train at 4:10 AM. He meets with a stranded woman, Madhu, and both find out that auto-rickshaws are on a flash strike due to a bomb blast at Ghatkopar. Their attempts to find alternate transportation are in vain, the duo then attend a bar and this is where both their lives will be turned upside down.::rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Nilesh Rastogi a call enter employee misses the last 1:40 am Locsl after his shift.He tries to take an auto-rickshaw but they are on strike as earlier in the evening there was a blast in city at Ghatkopar.Nilesh sees a woman also stranded due to strike and approaches her.The woman introduces herself as Madhu,as there is still time for transport to start they decide to spend time together.The night will change the life of Nilesh forever as he will come across various people and will also find that Madhu is not whom she claims to be.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
synopsis:
"Ek Chalis Ki Last Local" (meaning 'That Last Train of 1:40 am') is a
fast paced dark-humored story about a call center executive Nilesh Rastogi (Abhay Deol), who misses his last late-night train of 1:40 am back home. With 70 bucks in his pocket, when 2 ½ later he catches the first morning local he has 2 ½ crore in his hands. How this guy lands up with this booty and a beautiful damsel Madhu (Neha Dhupia) by fortunatly missing his train, is this almost a real time comic thriller.
